name: Juniper and Tonic
keywords: juniper berries, lime juice, superfine sugar
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces juniper berries, crushed lightly in a coffee grinder
Thinly sliced lime rounds, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, combine sugar, 1 cup water and juniper berries. Simmer gently for 20 minutes. Let stand uncovered, 4 hours. Strain.
In a cocktail shaker, combine lime juice and juniper syrup. Pour into ice-filled highball glasses. Top with tonic water. Serve, garnished with lime slices.
